summary: Analyzed 10 subdirectories in Metalogic/. Found: Decidability/ missing README (8 files, needs creation); FMP/README.md lists non-existent files; Bundle/README.md missing ModalSaturation.lean; main README.md has stale architecture and sorry counts. All other READMEs need timestamp and cross-link updates.

artifacts.summary: Comprehensive audit of Metalogic/ README files with compliance analysis, findings, and prioritized implementation recommendations
